p: In this research, all the tested compounds showed a dose-dependent antibacterial in vitro activity against both Cmm and Rs. These evidences corroborated previous results obtained at similar or even lower EOs concentrations against Pseudomonas syringae pv. actinidiae [ 37]. Regarding Tve, it was previously reported to inhibit mycotoxins production and septoria leaf blotch complex (SLBC) symptoms development without significant effect on fungus growth [ 39, 43, 49]. On the contrary, our study highlighted a direct activity in reducing bacterial growth.
